member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.Mesh
member.summary: Initialization class for Mesh libraries on the Windows platform.

member.name: M:Goedel.Mesh.Mesh.Initialize(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize the cryptography, platform and Mesh machine libraries to use the Windows native platform features. This library is only supported on the Windows platform.
member.param: If true, use the test directory and registry key and key store. This allows the machine to be reset after testing is complete without risk to production data.

member.name: T:Goedel.Mesh.Platform.Linux.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Platform specific support for the Mesh on Linux.
